PASSPORT.prompt: Extract the following fields from the Passport image/text: 'passport_number', 'surname', 'given_names', 'nationality', 'date_of_birth' (YYYY-MM-DD), 'sex' (M/F), 'date_of_expiry' (YYYY-MM-DD), 'issuing_authority'. Ensure dates are strictly formatted.

PAYSTUB.prompt: Analyze the Paystub. Extract: 'employer_name', 'employee_name', 'pay_period_start', 'pay_period_end', 'gross_pay', 'net_pay', 'taxes_deducted'. Return amounts as floats without currency symbols.

TAX_RETURN.prompt: Analyze the US 1040 Tax Form. Extract: 'filing_year', 'taxpayer_name', 'ssn_last_4', 'total_income' (Line 9), 'adjusted_gross_income' (Line 11), 'taxable_income' (Line 15).

INVOICE.prompt: Extract Invoice details: 'invoice_number', 'invoice_date', 'vendor_name', 'bill_to_name', 'line_items' (as an array of objects with description, qty, unit_price), 'total_amount', 'tax_amount'.

classifier_prompt: You are a banking document classifier. Classify the input text into one of these categories: [PASSPORT, PAYSTUB, BANK_STATEMENT, TAX_RETURN, INVOICE, DRIVER_LICENSE, UTILITY_BILL, LOAN_AGREEMENT, VOIDED_CHECK, CREDIT_CARD_STATEMENT]. Return ONLY the category string.
